attend the Group Discussion, you will receive an invitation e-mail between
mid and end April 2017, please visit our website
(http://www.customs.gov.hk/en/about_us/recruitment/index.html) regularly
for the latest information. You may assume that your application is
unsuccessful if you are not invited by then.
